info.name: Keyblade Wielder
info.description: The Keyblade Wielder class created for a Kingdom Hearts inspired campaign.
info.author: AntiAlex

description.p: Keyblade Wielders are chosen by their Keyblades for their strong hearts.
A Keyblade Wielder is trained to protect Kingdom Hearts. This is done primarily by using the Keyblade, a powerful weapon with a heart of it's own.
As a Keyblade Wielder you gain the following class features.

Hit Dice:1d6 per Keyblade Wielder level
Hit Points at 1st Level:6 + Constitution modifier
Hit Points at Higher Levels:1d6 (or 4) + your Constitution modifier per Keyblade Wielder level after 1st
You start with the following equipment, in addition to the equipment granted by your background:

ul.li: (a) a dungeoneer's pack or (b) an explorer’s pack

description.p: When you reach 4th level, and again at 6th, 8th, 12th, 14th, 16th, and 19th level, you can increase one ability score of your choice by 2, or you can increase two ability scores of your choice by 1. As normal, you can’t increase an ability score above 20 using this feature.
During your training at Scala ad Caelum you became proficient in the use of melee weapons.

sheet.description: Your warrior spirit shines brightly in the darkness.

description.p: At 1st level, you gain the ability Charge
Once every 4 turns you may use charge to close the distance between you and an enemy by 10 foot and attack. This uses 1 action.

sheet.description: Once every 4 turns you may use charge to close the distance between you and an enemy by 10 foot and attack. This uses 1 action.

description.p: Beginning at 5th level, you can attack twice, instead of once, whenever you take the Attack action on your turn.
The number of attacks increases to three when you reach 11th level in this class and to four when you reach 20th level in this class.

sheet.description: You can attack twice, instead of once, whenever you take the Attack action on your turn
You can attack three times, instead of once, whenever you take the Attack action on your turn
You can attack four times, instead of once, whenever you take the Attack action on your turn

description.p: At 15th level you gain the ability to enter a temporary Form, in your case you may enter the Valor Form which grants you increased attack damage for 5 turns but you must complete a short rest before using this again.
Whenever you land a hit you deal double damage.

sheet.description: Transform into your Valor Form and deal double damage for 5 turns. You must complete a short rest before you may use this again.
